name: Tetris Effect
summary:
Tetris Effect is a tile-matching puzzle video game developed by Japanese studios Monstars and Resonair and published by Enhance Games. The game was released worldwide exclusively for the PlayStation 4 on November 9, 2018, and features support for the PlayStation VR. A Microsoft Windows version, with support for Oculus Rift and HTC Vive, is scheduled for release July 23, 2019.

Tetris Effect: Connected, the ultimate version of the original TE, plus all-new co-op and competitive online & local multiplayer modes, were announced on July 23, 2020. Coming to Game Pass, Xbox Series X, Xbox One (Smart Delivery) and Windows 10 PC.
